title: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 ESD Pre-Activated en-US Aug 2014 by G
description:
Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 Pre-Activated ESD en-US Aug 2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

File: 2008.R2.SP1.ESD.en-US.Aug2014.iso
Source: dvd-617601

Size: 3,20GB
Format: Bootable ISO

CRC32: fbadb924
MD5: ac2eed1ebaa02f45417f5ce0fb45898e
SHA-1: cd4a88795fcb216f7381dbb480911f6de4084d4b


[ CONTENTS ]

* USB3, Sata and Network drivers attached separately ($WinPEDriver$).

Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 4.5.3
* Hotfixes - 2014-08-12
* Internet Explorer 11

Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* DirectX June 2010
* KB890930


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows Server 2008 R2 Standard
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Standard Core
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise Core
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Datacenter
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Datacenter Core
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Web
* Windows Server 2008 R2 Web Core


[ FEATURES ]

* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

* Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades.

Activation instructions:
* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
* If you do not want to activate, just click on "Exit".
* If you want to activate, select Windows Loader and then click on "Begin Install"


[ Installation ]

* Create bootable USB 2,0 (highly recommended), minimum 8GB,
with Rufus v1.4.9 (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.


[ CREDITS TO ]

* G2 - .NET integration, Windows 7 ESD
